name: Cờ Tỷ Phú - Vietnamese Monopoly
description: A web-based board game inspired by 'Cờ Tỷ Phú' (Vietnamese Monopoly) for 2-4 players. Players roll dice, move around the board, buy properties, and collect rent. The goal is to be the last player with money. This version features human vs. human gameplay with a classic board layout.
